entry.title: Stale Bear
entry.summary: Stale fish eating bear artwork suitable for apparel brand or band merchandise…
entry.content:
Stale fish eating bear artwork suitable for apparel brand or band merchandise design such as T-shirts, posters, stickers, pins, album covers, etc.

Send message through email or social media platform messaging system on contact page for inquiries and custom illustration works.

Status

Available

Specification

  • A4 canvas at 600 dpi in raster Photoshop .psd format
  • 5 colours excluding black
  • Each colours laid in separate layers
  • Text and colours can be changed

Ownership

It's yours to keep forever and free to use however you want once you've bought it.
